title: Traveling around Wilmington it appears that only about half the residents have recycling bins--therefore I assume the rest are not participating.  Given the problems at the landfill and ecological benefits of recycling, would it be possible for Waste Management to make recycling mandatory?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2015/06/has-the-city-considered-requiring-residents-to-recycle/
